main.name: James Seagram
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio website.  Thank you so much for visiting
main.bio: Front-end engineer with back-end knowledge and experience using react and node.js to create web applications.  Lover of all things outdoors.  Continually learning.  Curious about technology and where we are heading.
main.contactmessage: I would love to get in contact with you.  Please fill out the form below to reach me via email.

resume.skillmessage: Web development technology including: HTML5, Javascript, CSS, ReactJs, nodeJs, express, serverless technology, and CSS libraries/frameworks (Materialize, Chakra)

education.description: Knowledge of financial markets, investment strategy, and the practical application of economic theories and analysis. My experience at UM was one of the best times of my life. Go Griz!

work.title: Senior Investor Services Specialist
work.description: I began as a contract employee, ranking at the top of my class for three consecutive months until I was offered a full-time position at one of the worlds leading global asset management companies.  Helped educate our retail investors in making better decisions to achieve their investment goals.

work.title: Bartender
work.description: Had a great experience serving regulars their favorite cocktails as well as building raport with newcommers to our bar
